roleset.name: give a false name to hide real name
roleset.note: CODENAME-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from codename.01-v)

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: On December 4 , 2011 , the area of Iran 's ten - day military exercise code - named " Velayat 90 " will cover 2,000 kilometers from the east of the Strait of Hormuz to the Gulf of Aden .
